se.idsec.signservice.integration.document.xml

Class XMLSignatureLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.signservice.integration.document.xml.XMLSignatureLocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extensible

    public class XMLSignatureLocation
extends Object
implements Extensible
    Tells where in an XML document the signature should be inserted. The default is to add it as the last child of the document root element.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

      • setChildPosition

        public void setChildPosition(String childPosition)
        Sets the position in the selected parent node where the signature element should be installed (first or last). The default is "last".
        Parameters:
        childPosition - the position

      • getChildPosition

        public String getChildPosition()
        Indicator for first or last child of a selected parent node. The default is "last". See XMLSignatureLocation.ChildPosition for possible values.
        Returns:
        the position (first of last)

      • getXPath

        public String getXPath()
        The XPath expression for selecting the parent node (or null which means the the parent node is the document root element). the XPath expression for locating the parent node of the Signature element
        Returns:
        the XPath expression for locating the parent node of the Signature element

      • setXPath

        public void setXPath(String xPath)
        The XPath expression for selecting the parent node (or null which means the the parent node is the document root element).
        Parameters:
